Detailed Description

wxPGValueType is base class for property value types.

Member Function Documentation

virtual wxPGProperty* wxPGValueType::GenerateProperty (  const wxString &  label,
const wxString &  name,
wxVariant &  value
)  const [pure virtual]
 

Creates new property instance with "proper" class.

Initial value is extracted from wxVariant value.

virtual const wxChar* wxPGValueType::GetCustomTypeName (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns custom type name.

If base editor for a type, should not be overridden, as the base implementation already does good thing and calls GetTypeName. Otherwise, should be an unique string, such as the class name etc.

virtual size_t wxPGValueType::GetTypeSize (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns size of the value type.

Usually returning sizeof(MyValueClass) is sufficient. If size is > 0xFFFF, then this is a base class (for example, wxObject) which size would not necessarily be large enough for the actual value used. In other words, this means that the size is not known exactly.
